verses.name: Mark 1:1
verses.text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ, the Son of God;

verses.name: Mark 1:2
verses.text: As it is written in the prophets, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.

verses.name: Mark 1:3
verses.text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.

verses.name: Mark 1:4
verses.text: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.

verses.name: Mark 1:5
verses.text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judea, and they of Jerusalem, and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan, confessing their sins.
